Syntax.js - Unknown Language

This is a basic example of how to use Syntax.js to highlight code that uses an unknown language (the layout is still rendered).

                    var something = true;
    
                    if ( something ) {
                        console.log( "Output is written." ); // Comment
                        
                        /* Multi-line
                        comment */
                    }
                

                    

                        
                        
Syntax.js - Basic

                        
This is a basic example of how to use Syntax.js to highlight code inside a DOM element.
